content: searching for sea glass shoulder cozy by elizabeth finn knitting from the heart shop hop 2023 materials one skein trippin with dixi merino silk sport 335 y/100g size us 8 needles any length straights or 24 circulars work well tapestry needle sewing needle 5 20 mm buttons gauge approximately 5 stitches per inch in pattern blocked gauge will affect size drape and amount of yarn used but is not critical dimensions 12 x 42 terms used k knit yo yarnover wrap yarn around right needle counterclockwise k2tog knit two stitches together repeat what is in the parentheses as directed this piece is rectangular in shape then folded in half lengthwise buttons are used to connect sides using yarnovers as buttonholes see photos for the many ways to wear your shoulder cozy let s begin cast on 61 stitches row 1 knit row 2 k2 yo k2tog to last stitch k1 repeat row 1 and 2 until desired length * knit one row *leave enough yarn to bind off and sew on buttons bind off very loosely block to approximately 12 x 42 sew five buttons beginning at the second yarnover in corner on front as shown sew remaining four buttons along the horizontal edge leaving desired space for neck opening when buttoned fold in half and button so that right sides are overlapping dash lines represent yarnover buttonholes that are already part of the cozy thank you so much for participating in this year s shop hop project designed by elizabeth finn copyright 2023 all rights reserved
